mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tb ( member_id, member_email, member_pw, member_auth, member_phone, member_name , member_appenddate, member_updatedate) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberAuth},#{memberPhone}, #{memberName} , #{appendDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.reservation_creation_date) AS row_num, a.reservation_no, a.reservation_date, a.reservation_creation_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.reservation_status, a.room_no, a.roption_no, b.room_title, c.roption_title from reservation_tb a left join room_tb b on a.room_no = b.room_no LEFT JOIN roomoption_tb c ON a.roption_no = c.roption_no WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} AND reservation_status = 1 or 2 LIMIT #{params.pagination.limitStart}, #{params.recordSize}
select * from room_tb order by room_no desc limit 0, 5

select a.*, IFNULL(b.cnt, 0) as cnt, IFNULL(c.created_date, '0101-01-01'), IFNULL(c.save_name, 'noImage'), IFNULL(c.original_name, 'noImage') FROM room_tb a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_no, COUNT(roption_no) cnt FROM roomoption_tb GROUP BY room_no ) b ON a.room_no = b.room_no LEFT JOIN ( select room_no, thumbnail, file_delete, created_date, save_name, original_name from roomimage_tb where thumbnail = 'Y' and file_delete = 'N' ) c (room_no, thumbnail, file_delete, created_date, save_name, original_name) ON a.room_no = c.room_no WHERE a.room_delete = 0 AND b.cnt != 0 order by room_no desc limit 0, 6
